name: Distribution Event Reminder sms template
description: Helpfull in shaping message sent as a reminder to patients
smsTemplate: Dear {{name}}, this message is to remind you of the forth comming event {{event_title}} for {{event_group}} scheduled for {{event_time}} at {{event_venue}}.Please note {{event_remarks}}.For more inquiries kindly contact {{event_organizer}}.To stop reply with STOP
